title: Literally a Gun

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You're a fucking gun, shoot someone. Actually shoot as many people as you want per night, nobody cares.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If **ANY** of your targets survive your attack for any reason, all of them do.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__
